is a disobedient believer” and this does not contradict the trust.Rather, Al -Hakim was removed from Muawiyah ibn Quran.And they said: The one who is reluctant.He said: You are the ones who are consumed, but the deceased is a man who has loved his love in the stomach of the earth and relies on his Lord, Glory be to God.And the words of this chapter in this chapter in its place.And what is
